title: Received 0 LP After Ranked Victory 9/17/16

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Yesterday, I was queued up with my friend playing some ranked.  People in my last few games were complaining about lag and I thought they were just joking because they'd say it after every death. Then I noticed it looked like they opened mid but it was actually 4 of them getting disconnected. We won the game off that and I went into my next game. After winning that game, I was stuck loading the game stats where it shows score, damage, and everything else. I decided to restart my client after because usually when that happeneds, my game crashes in champ select and i lose ~10 LP from it. The servers shortly went down after and I went to bedthinking about how I gained so much LP kappa. The enemy team didn't even get loss prevention.

The game I didn't get LP from - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2295801173/216086193?tab=overview

replies.body:
The unfortunate thing about service incidents is that the game server can miss recording the match results and thus not grant you the right LP for a match win/loss. We cannot modify or change any LP after the match has finished, unfortunately. The system was designed this way to prevent abuse in any way. 

The service issues last night were resolved shortly after they began, so if you still have issues, please let me know.
